text: A voluntary body formed by members of a particular branch of trade or industry to represent the interests of members is known as
What is NOT a suitable reason for the growth in large retail business?

options.A: distribution of wealth through expansion of retail outlets because there is great profit
options.B: improved transportation system which makes people able to move about easily to buy goods
options.C: low cost per unit of goods resulting from economics of large scale
options.D: people’s willingness to migrate from rural areas to towns for white collar jobs
options.E: rise in standards of living of people resulting from improved wages/salaries

explanation: People’s willingness to migrate from rural areas to towns for white collar jobsdoes not directly relate to the growth of large retail businesses. While urban migration can impact overall economic development, it is not a primary factor in the expansion of retail businesses.

text: Under what form of life insurance policy is premium paid over an agreed number of years and the sum assured is paid either at the end of that specified time or when the policy holder dies, whichever comes first?

text: Which is NOT a public corporation?
National income is

text: Production means

options.A: changing the form of a good at any stage from the raw material to the finished products
options.B: increasing economic welfare of people by producing more goods and services
options.C: moving goods from one place to another for proper use
options.D: the amount of satisfaction derived from the consumption of goods and services
options.E: the provision of goods and services which are capable of satisfying human wants

explanation: Production involves creating goods and services that meet the needs and desires of consumers. It's about providing something of value that people can use to satisfy their various wants and needs. This process includes all activities from the extraction of raw materials, through manufacturing, to the final delivery of products and services to consumers.

text: Which union is formed by the workers of firms of similar line of business to cater for their interests?
explanation: A trade union is an organized association of workers in a trade, group of trades, or profession, formed to protect and further their rights and interests.

text: A syndicate is an/a
